channel.title: How do i make my own hamachi server? please help
channel.description:
i have all these stuff downloaded ill post below.......
downloaded stuff i already downloaded:
-hamachi -WinRAR -i got my ip from www.no-ip.com -i got my server source and server source builder but there in my WinRAR this is the strange part ive been haveing problems with... i click on compile bat and it has all this
c-compile ur server r-to run server e-to exit
and i typed (c) and it said i need a JDK 5.0, or JDK 6.0 or any JDK 6.0,or 5.0 updates
and i typed (r) to run server and it says i dont have a server class. Make sure you use a compiler on ur server before you try running it.....
what am i doing wronge please help and how will i make my own hamachi server from where im at wat i need to do next in order to make i have created my hamachi on the hamachi download thing but i cant play it. if you can tell me wat i need to still do and guide me though please.
thanks for you time.[br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2007, 02:51:19 PM[/size][hr][quote author=robbert ownz link=topic=172644.msg1594766#msg1594766 date=1184377879] i have all these stuff downloaded ill post below.......
downloaded stuff i already downloaded:
-hamachi -WinRAR -i got my ip from www.no-ip.com -i got my server source and server source builder but there in my WinRAR this is the strange part ive been haveing problems with... i click on compile bat and it has all this
c-compile ur server r-to run server e-to exit
and i typed (c) and it said i need a JDK 5.0, or JDK 6.0 or any JDK 6.0,or 5.0 updates
and i typed (r) to run server and it says i dont have a server class. Make sure you use a compiler on ur server before you try running it.....
what am i doing wronge please help and how will i make my own hamachi server from where im at wat i need to do next in order to make i have created my hamachi on the hamachi download thing but i cant play it. if you can tell me wat i need to still do and guide me though please.
and i click on runserver.bat..... and it says:exception in thread "main"java.lagnoclassdeffounderror:server.... i dont know what the heck is going on

i have all these stuff downloaded ill post below…

downloaded stuff i already downloaded:

-hamachi
-WinRAR
-i got my ip from www.no-ip.com
-i got my server source and server source builder but there in my WinRAR this is the strange part ive been haveing problems with… i click on compile bat and it has all this

c-compile ur server
r-to run server
e-to exit

and i typed © and it said i need a JDK 5.0, or JDK 6.0 or any JDK 6.0,or 5.0 updates

and i typed ® to run server and it says i dont have a server class. Make sure you use a compiler on ur server before you try running it…

if you can tell me wat i need to still do and guide me though please.
